title: Sri Lanka may be able to get US$3bn from IMF: Sabry
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT  –  Sri Lanka may be able to get 3 billion US dollars from the International Monetary Fund, and as well as financial support from other countries, Finance Minister Ali Sabry said.
When we go to the IMF we get confidence and bridging finance
“I think we can get 3bn from IMF, over three years 1 billion each from IMF only,” Sabry said.
“From the World Bank we can get. From Japan we can get. From China. India has helped us greatly already.”
Sabry said he had given his resignation but no one has come forward to take the jobs.
